data: Down an old trail in the Ghost Range in northwestern Mexico, just across the Arizona border, a mounted prospector wound his way, his horse carefully picking its steps among the broken granite blocks which had tumbled upon the ancient path from the mountain wall above.
Ghost Range | northwestern Mexico | Arizona border
The Round-Up: A Romance of Arizona; Novelized from Edmund Day's Melodrama
Murray, John; Day, Edmund, 1866-1923; Miller, Marion Mills, 1864-1949
